description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has used timestomping to alter the Standard Information timestamps on their web shells to match other files in the same directory.(Citation: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22)

external_references.description: Mandiant. (2022, May 2). UNC3524: Eye Spy on Your Email. Retrieved August 17, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Mandiant APT29 Eye Spy Email Nov 22
